title: Markets
content:
BRINGING FUNCTION TO BEAUTY

Accuride Architectural Woodworking

BUILT-IN BENEFITS

Dependable

Every model of Accuride slide undergoes as many as 50,000 cycles of testing to ensure smooth, consistent movement.

Diverse

Accuride offers slides, guides, and linear track systems for any need and with many additional features, including soft-close and touch-release.

Compliant

Accuride products comply with the strictest industry standards, including those of the AWI and BHMA

Made to the Toughest Standards

Accuride products run through 50,000 cycles of rigorous testing. Need more assurance? We back all our products with a Limited Lifetime Warranty.

SPECIFIED TO YOUR NEEDS

It’s easy to specify Accuride slides:

You can also download three-part spec PDF complete with testing information and guidelines.

DOWNLOAD A SPECIFICATION GUIDE
Have a Specialized Project? Download a Specialty Project Spec Guide

1.3.1 SPECIFICATION SUGGESTIONS

Solutions for Any Challenge

SECTION 06 41 00 I Architectural Wood Casework

LIGHT & MEDIUM-DUTY DRAWERS

Drawers 24 in. [610 mm] wide or less: Accuride 7434 (7432, full extension) all ball bearing slide, with rail mount, full extension + 1 in. [25 mm] over travel, hold-in detent, 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating, and progressive movement.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc
  • Optional finish: black zinc

Drawers 30 in. [762 mm] wide or less: Accuride 3132EC Eclipse, fully concealed under-mount slide with ball bearing and polymer rollers, with lever disconnect, full extension, soft-closing action, and 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc

SecTION 12 35 00: Specialty Casework

HEAVY-DUTY DRAWERS

Drawers 24 in. [610 mm] wide or less: Accuride 7434 (7432, full extension) all ball bearing slide, with rail mount, full extension + 1 in. [25 mm] over travel, hold-in detent, 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating, and progressive movement.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc
  • Optional finish: black zinc

Drawers 30 in. [762 mm] wide or less: Accuride 3132EC Eclipse, fully concealed under-mount slide with ball bearing and polymer rollers, with lever disconnect, full extension, soft-closing action, and 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc

Drawers 30 in. [762 mm] wide or less: Accuride 3132EC Eclipse, fully concealed under-mount slide with ball bearing and polymer rollers, with lever disconnect, full extension, soft-closing action, and 100 lbs./pr. [45 kg] load rating.

  • Standard finish: clear zinc

SOLUTIONS DRIVEN

Find the right movement solution, whatever your need. Below are a few examples.

UNDERMOUNT

3135EC Easy-Close For undermount drawers up to 30 inches wide 3160EC Easy-Close For undermount drawers 31 to 60 inches wide

LINEAR TRACK SYSTEM

UNDERMOUNT

3135EC Easy-Close For undermount drawers up to 30 inches wide 3160EC Easy-Close For undermount drawers 31 to 60 inches wide

LINEAR TRACK SYSTEM

UNLIMITED POSSIBILITIES

Accuride offers numerous special access and closing features to enhance the design and functionality of your casework.

Touch-Release

Just a slight push inward and the slide latch releases, propelling the drawer open 2”.

3832TR, 3832HDTR

See More...

Easy-Close

Bring drawers to a smooth, gentle close every time with our patented Easy-Close feature.

3832EC, 3160EC, 3135EC, 115RC, 3600EC (OEM Only)

See More...

Detent-Out

Firmly holds drawers and pull-out surfaces in extended positions

3832DO, 2109, Keyboard Tray Systems

See More...

Lock-In/Lock-Out

Keeps drawers, trays, and panels secured in closed and open positions for prolonged access.

9308E

See More...

Lock-Out

Locks drawers and other pull-out surfaces in extended position until released by a lever.

2907WB, 340, 3307, 9307

See More...

LIMITLESS ENVIRONMENT APPLICATIONS

ACCURIDE IN ACTION

Accuride products are used throughout the globe. Read about how our movement solutions helped modernize one of Europe’s historic sites.
